_meta.title: Remove deprecated hybrid baseline implementation and references
_meta.summary: Repository cleanup that removes deprecated hybrid-baseline code path, CLI flags, docs, and profiles.
notes: Post-change baseline set is limited to astar / hybrid_astar / rrt_star (plus MPC tracking path rollout when enabled).
Use fixed random pairs from configs/repro_20260206_6baselines_fair_forest_a_pairs.json for repeatable comparison.
